mapper.select:
select count(*) from textbook t, roadmap_detail r
t.textbook_no=r.textbook_no
and ( #{r_detail_startdate} between r_detail_startdate and r_detail_enddate or #{r_detail_enddate} between r_detail_startdate and r_detail_enddate)
and r_no in (select r_no from roadmap where u_no in(select u_no from user_info where u_id like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' or u_name like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'))
and r_no in (select r_no from roadmap where u_no in(select u_no from user_info where ${category} like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'))
and s_no=#{s_no}
and r_no in (select r_no from roadmap where cate_sub_no=#{cate_sub_no})

select rr.* from ( select rownum rnum, bb.* from ( select r.* ,(select cate_sub_name from category_sub c where c.cate_sub_no = ( select cate_sub_no from roadmap m where m.r_no=r.r_no ) ) as cate_sub_name ,(select u_name from user_info u where u.u_no=t.u_no) as u_name ,(select s_name from subject s where s.s_no=r.s_no) as s_name ,(select count(*) from roadmap_detail rd, roadmap rm where rd.r_no=rm.r_no(+) and rd.r_no=r.r_no) as r_count from textbook t, roadmap_detail r
t.textbook_no=r.textbook_no
and ( r_detail_startdate between #{r_detail_startdate} and #{r_detail_enddate} or r_detail_enddate between #{r_detail_startdate} and #{r_detail_enddate})
and r_no in (select r_no from roadmap where u_no in(select u_no from user_info where u_id like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' or u_name like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'))
and r_no in (select r_no from roadmap where u_no in(select u_no from user_info where ${category} like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'))
and s_no=#{s_no}
and r_no in (select r_no from roadmap where cate_sub_no=#{cate_sub_no})
) bb ) rr where ceil(rnum/#{limit})=#{page} order by rnum

select s.s_name || '-' || r.r_detail_grade as r_grade ,count(r.r_detail_grade) as r_grade_ct from subject s, roadmap_detail r
s.s_no=r.s_no and r.s_no > 0
and ( r.r_detail_startdate between #{r_detail_startdate} and #{r_detail_enddate} or r.r_detail_enddate between #{r_detail_startdate} and #{r_detail_enddate})
and r.r_no in (select r_no from roadmap where u_no in(select u_no from user_info where u_id like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' or u_name like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'))
and r.r_no in (select r_no from roadmap where u_no in(select u_no from user_info where ${category} like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'))
and s.s_no=#{s_no}
and r.r_no in (select r_no from roadmap where cate_sub_no=#{cate_sub_no})
group by s.s_no,s.s_name,r.r_detail_grade order by s.s_no,s.s_name,r.r_detail_grade

select a.textbook_content,sum(d.book_ct) book_ct from (select g.gi_no, g.gi_nm,t.textbook_no,t.textbook_content from grade_info g, textbook t where textbook_no in (select distinct textbook_no from roadmap_detail) and g.gi_no > 0 ) a , (select textbook_no,count(textbook_no) book_ct from roadmap_detail r
and ( r.r_detail_startdate between #{r_detail_startdate} and #{r_detail_enddate} or r.r_detail_enddate between #{r_detail_startdate} and #{r_detail_enddate})
and r.r_no in (select r_no from roadmap where u_no in(select u_no from user_info where u_id like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' or u_name like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'))
and r.r_no in (select r_no from roadmap where u_no in(select u_no from user_info where ${category} like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'))
and r.s_no=#{s_no}
and r.r_no in (select r_no from roadmap where cate_sub_no=#{cate_sub_no})
group by textbook_no ) d where a.textbook_no=d.textbook_no(+) group by a.textbook_content order by a.textbook_content
